title: PlaceholderAPI有没有原版的变量
author: CHHBlock
txt_content: 如题，如果有原版的变量，该如何加载

replies.txt_content:
http://mineplugin.org/Placeholde ... 7.BB.8F.E6.B5.8E.29
所有变量，原版不需要下载。
下载按照下面这张方式下载并重载
papi ecloud download player
papi ecloud download vault
papi ecloud download server
papi ecloud download javascript
papi ecloud download Multiverse
papi reload
papi reload

replies.author: miao_mi520
